bodyHeader: I am a React Native developer now for more than 4 years.

smartiDescription: Over the last few years I have completed several personal projects. Here I show you one of my latest projects which is available on the Google Play Store. I made this application to learn marketing (social networks, in-app), to improve my design skills and also to improve my react native skills.

work.title: CTO - React Native & Firebase
work.description:
Efficience Digitale is an agency that innovates with a technical team in React Native.
During this mission I performed a code audit in order to find the potential technical debt on this project. I also had the opportunity to do project management on 4 different projects in order to bring my expertise on these different subjects.
I had the opportunity to work on UX/UI re-design (Thanks to Trello, Notion)
Refactorisation of new features (multi language, offline version...)
‚û§ Testing

Circular is a start-up that makes connected rings equipped with biosensors and connected to an application that analyzes body signals, allowing to improve sleep, physical activities and health.
On this mission I continued the development of their application in React Native. I had the opportunity to help Circular to put their product in production on the App Store.

work.title: Developer Front - React Native
work.description:
This experience allowed me to help the front-end development of the mindDay web application. It allowed me to discover or deepen my skills on

work.title: Internship and freelance - FullStack
work.description: I had the chance to work in this very interesting start-up, betM. This experience allowed me to professionalize myself to manage part of a project alone. During this experience I had the chance to conceptualize, design and code new features and refactor (a lot...)The skills I used were React Native, Firebase, Node JS and React JS.To design and organize the project, I used Asana and Figma.
